named-query.name: seguimiento.get.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Seguimiento o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1 order by o.segFecInicio ASC

named-query.name: recomendacion.get.all.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and (o.recEstado = 1 or o.recEstado = 3) and o.regActivo = 1 order by o.cedulaNota.cedId

named-query.name: comentario.by.hallazgo.seguimiento
named-query.query: select o from Comentario o where o.seguimiento.segId = ?1 and o.cedulaNota.cedId = ?2 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: hallazgos.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: seguimiento.recomendaciones.seguimiento.selected
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.seguimiento.segId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: seguimiento.auditores.asignados
named-query.query: select o.usuario from AuditoriaResponsable o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: cedula.nota.por.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1 and o.cedEstado in (8) and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: recomendaciones.cedula.nota
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.cedulaNota.cedId = ?1 and (o.recEstado = 1 or o.recEstado = 3) and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: seguimiento.hallazgo.auditoria.auditado
named-query.query: select o from CedulaNota o where o.regActivo = 1 and (o.cedEstado between 8 and 9) and o.auditoria.audId in (select a.auditoria.audId from Seguimiento a where a.segFecFin is null and a.regActivo = 1 and a.auditoria.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1)

named-query.name: seguimiento.recomendaciones.por.seguimiento
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.cedulaNota.cedId = ?1
